entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.50.11
entry.content:
‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • feat: support mcp permissions (#7469) @Gamal72

üß© Pieces

  • feat(returning-ai): add reply message action (#7461) @mg-wunna
  • feat(bird): add scheduled for field (#7502) @geekyme

üé® Enhancements & Polish

  • feat: add caching for populated flow and enhance async webhook request (#7419) @hazemadelkhalel
  • feat: enhance async and refactor webhook handler (#7430) @hazemadelkhalel

üìö Documentation

  • fix: remove You from all contributors and add s31w4n as contributor f‚Ä¶ (#7449) @s31w4n

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@Gamal72, @abuaboud, @dependabot, @geekyme, @hazemadelkhalel, @kishanprmr, @mg-wunna and @s31w4n

entry.title: New release for Activepieces: 0.51.0
entry.content:
‚ú® Exciting New Features

  • feat: introduce replace connections and show flows using connection dialog (#7484) @hazemadelkhalel
  • feat: add a new flow operation to update metadata (#7482) @felipetio

üß© Pieces

  • feat(Gslide): generate from template new props placeholder (#7514) @Kevinyu-alan
  • feat(straico): add RAG actions and API integration for Straico (#7523) @dennisrongo
  • feat(dust): upload file piece (#7518) @TimPetricola
  • feat(claude): add extended thinking mode (#7467) @kishanprmr
  • fix(slack): fix trigger for private channel (#7487) @kishanprmr
  • feat(backblaze): upload file, read file actions and new file trigger (#7511) @nhnansari
  • feat(straico): add file upload, update image generation, update prompt completion (#7494) @dennisrongo
  • feat(google-tasks): add due date property to Add Google task action (#7495) @AnkitSharmaOnGithub

üêû Bug Fixes

  • chore: skip validation for missing connections in project release (#7522) @hazemadelkhalel
  • fix: show resend verification email if user signs in with unverified email (#7519) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: login using Google without popup (#7516) @AbdulTheActivePiecer
  • fix: timeout should be handled by exit too (#7515) @abuaboud

üìö Documentation

  • docs: add TimPetricola as a contributor for code (#7520) @allcontributors
  • docs: add nhnansari as a contributor for plugin (#7517) @allcontributors
  • docs: add AnkitSharmaOnGithub as a contributor for plugin (#7513) @allcontributors

Thanks ‚ù§Ô∏è

@AbdulTheActivePiecer, @AnkitSharmaOnGithub, @Kevinyu-alan, @TimPetricola, @abuaboud, @allcontributors, @allcontributors[bot], @dennisrongo, @felipetio, @hazemadelkhalel, @kishanprmr and @nhnansari
